local_schema.longdesc: If time based notifications should be used. If set to false, then the percentage change is used instead, which may fix a broken ACPI BIOS.

local_schema.short_desc: If the learnt profile should be used to calculate the time remaining
local_schema.longdesc: If the learnt profile should be used to calculate the time remaining. Only turn this off for debugging.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether NetworkManager should be connected and disconnected on sleep
local_schema.longdesc: Whether NetworkManager should disconnect before suspending or hibernating and connect on resume.
The version of the installed version of the schema. Do not edit this value, it is used so that configure changes between versions can be detected.
If the CPU load should be checked before doing the idle action.
